General.Name: RLJ Lodging Trust
General.Description: RLJ Lodging Trust (RLJ) is a self-advised, publicly traded real estate investment trust that owns 95 premium-branded, rooms-oriented, high-margin, urban-centric hotels located within the heart of demand locations. Our hotels are geographically diverse and concentrated in major urban markets that provide multiple demand generators from business, leisure, and other travelers.
General.Address: 7373 Wisconsin Avenue, Bethesda, MD, United States, 20814
